title: Sub-Mariner Comics
additional-notes: A note in the 1969 CCE Periodicals volume says to 'consult copyright office' for full issue renewal information.  The renewal for the first issue was recorded in the July-December 1977 CCE Periodicals volume, and was filed in 1968.

The first run of this comic ended in 1949.  A second run, continuing the numbering of the first run, began in 1954 and ended in 1955.  Some issues were titled 'The Submariner' and some titled 'Sub-Mariner Comics'.  Later runs, all after automatic renewals began, had their own issue numbering.
